name: spaces
description: A CLI wrapper for the itopia Spaces API
author: Jan Van Bruggen @JanCVanB

oclif.description:
A CLI wrapper for the itopia Spaces API
For more information about itopia Spaces, see https://spaces.itopia.com
For more information about the itopia Spaces API, see https://api.spaces.itopia.com

Examples:
spaces login
spaces help organization
spaces organization:list
spaces deployment:create --name='My Deployment' ...

collection.description:
Manage your deployments' collections (end user access)
A "collection" is a set of metadata for grouping spaces, and it contains:
- spaces
- end users

deployment.description:
Manage your organizations' deployments (regional resources)
A "deployment" is a set of regional itopia-managed resources for running spaces, and it contains:
- collections (for grouping spaces)
- settings

organization.description:
Manage your organizations (administrator access)
An "organization" is a set of metadata for managing spaces, and it contains:
- deployments (for running spaces)
- images (for defining spaces)
- administrators
- a billing account

space.description:
Manage your collections' spaces
A "space" is a remote environment for your end users to work inside, and it contains:
- sessions (of active end users)
- settings

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run package
scripts.format-and-error-if-any-warnings: warnings=$(npm run format -- --check 2>&1 >/dev/null) && if [ ! -z "$warnings" ]; then echo "$warnings" && (exit 1); fi;
scripts.test: npm run format-and-error-if-any-warnings && npm run lint-and-error-if-any-warnings && npm run build && npm run e2e
